item.title: Research/Talks - The hack, the crash and two smoking barrels. (And all the times I (almost) killed an engineer.)
item.description: Planned to be presented in DefCon 32 - Engage, on August 8th - 11th, 2024, in Las Vegas, NV. Conference Link
